description: The CAP_PAY table contains information about capitation payments.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the transaction.

columns.name: TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Incoming Receipt


PCP Capitation


Specialty Capitation


AP Claims Adjustment


Withhold Adjustment


General Adjustment


Other Reimbursement


PCP Capitation Adjustment


Specialty Capitation Adjustment

columns.name: TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Loaded


Reconciled


Calculated


AP Batched


Paid


Void

columns.name: SPECIAL_TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The special transaction type of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Retro


AP Claims Holdback


Paid By Carrier Claim


Withhold Payback


COB Savings Member Payout


Refund


Extra Refund


Remittance Recovery


Write-off Refund


HRA Remittance Recovery


Prepayment


Future Prepayment


Prepayment Recovery

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of the transaction.

columns.name: POSTING_DATE
columns.description: The posting date of the transaction.

columns.name: ELIGIBILITY_DATE
columns.description: The eligibility date of the transaction.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who created the transaction.

columns.name: COMMENT_LINE
columns.description: The free text comment of the transaction.

columns.name: MEM_DOB
columns.description: The date of birth of the member in the transaction.

columns.name: MEM_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sex of the member in the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: MEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the associated transaction member list. It is only populated for Specialty Capitation transactions.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area ID of the transaction.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The carrier ID of the transaction.

columns.name: CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: NETWORK_ID
columns.description: The network ID of the transaction.

columns.name: NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: PLAN_ID
columns.description: The benefit ID of the transaction.

columns.name: PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The employer group ID of the transaction.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: LOCATION_ID
columns.description: The primary location ID of the transaction.

columns.name: PCP_PROV_ID
columns.description: The primary care provider ID of the transaction.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID of the member in the transaction.

columns.name: SPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specialty of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPEC_RATE
columns.description: The rate for specialty of the transaction.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The vendor ID of the transaction.

columns.name: VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: TX_CANC_TX_ID
columns.description: The transaction ID which cancels this transaction.

columns.name: REPLACES_DTX
columns.description: The transaction that this transaction replaces.

columns.name: REPLACED_BY_DTX
columns.description: The transaction which replaced this transaction.

columns.name: RTRO_CNCL_BY_ID
columns.description: The retro transaction ID that canceled this transaction.

columns.name: RTRO_CNCL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category of the retro mismatch code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Duplicate Transaction


Member Not Eligible


Incorrect Capitation Context or Amount

columns.name: SPEC_MEMBER_MONTHS
columns.description: The specialty member months of the transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount of the adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The vendor ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: ADJ_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJU_CLAIM_LINE
columns.description: The claim line number of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_MEM_ID
columns.description: The member ID associated with this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_MEM_DOB
columns.description: The date of birth of the member in this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_MEM_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sex of the member in this adjustment transaction.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEM_SEX_C_NAME

columns.name: ADJ_MEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The member list ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_PCP_ID
columns.description: The primary care provider ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_SPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specialty of this adjustment transaction.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPECIALTY_C_NAME

columns.name: ADJ_SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_CARRIER_ID
columns.description: The carrier ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_CARRIER_ID_CARRIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the carrier record.

columns.name: ADJ_NETWORK_ID
columns.description: The network ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: ADJ_BEN_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The benefit plan ID of this adjustment transaction.

columns.name: ADJ_BEN_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: DIST_LOB_ID
columns.description: The capitation payment line of business.

columns.name: DIST_LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: DIST_RKP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the risk panel for capitation distribution.

columns.name: DIST_RKP_ID_RISK_PANEL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk panel.

columns.name: DIST_MGRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the member group for capitation distribution.

columns.name: DIST_MGRP_ID_MEM_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the member group

columns.name: CAP_RETRO_LEVEL
columns.description: Retro level capitation transactions.

columns.name: MEM_COUNT
columns.description: The number of members listed in the associated member list of the transaction. This data is only populated for Specialty Capitation transactions.

columns.name: RELEASED_TO_AP_YN
columns.description:
Whether the transaction has been released to accounts payable (AP).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CAP_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The member's county used in outgoing capitation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PCP_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount for this transaction. This is only populated for PCP capitation transactions.

columns.name: MCARE_CONTRACT_NUM
columns.description: The medicare advantage contract number that matches the Member Group's medicare advantage contract number.

columns.name: WITHHOLD_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The PCP capitation payment withhold reason category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Member Suspended


Member Limit Exceeded
